ISSUE.TITLE: Labeling UI not working correctly for Taxonomy tag
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Describe the bug** We have created a taxonomy using the [label studio playground](https://labelstud.io/playground/). When loading this taxonomy our project, the behavior in the UI is different and also a bit confusing for our end users. In the playground, when we select a certain item in the taxonomy, we can see the checkbox changing in the parent and children of this item. Shown in screenshot 1. When we do this in our deployed version of label studio, this is not working. Shown in screenshot 2. **To Reproduce** Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. Setup a project with attached taxonomy.xml label_config. 2. Click on the project 3. Label all tasks 4. When labeling, notice behavior mentioned above. **Expected behavior** We expect the behavior of the UI to be in line with the label studio playground. The taxonomy tag was working fine for us before we upgraded to label studio 1.3.0. **Screenshots** Screenshot 1: ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/79454108/137903396-5a9076f6-c245-4874-bc2f-0fcd3efc3740.png) Click checkbox indicated in with the red arrow, UI updated checkboxes indicated with grey arrows. Screenshot 2: [taxonony.zip](https://github.com/heartexlabs/label-studio/files/7372998/taxonony.zip) [taxonony.zip](https://github.com/heartexlabs/label-studio/files/7372999/taxonony.zip) ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/79454108/137903915-210c2ee0-48a8-4f50-8c2c-20029e5b85b3.png) Click the checkbox indicated with the red arrow, UI is not updating other checkboxes. **Environment (please complete the following information):** - OS: Linux - Label Studio Version1.3.0 **Additional context** Add any other context about the problem here.
